definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: An exquisite flower adorned her dress.
sentences.chinese: 她的上衣上别一枚别致的胸花做为点缀。

sentences.english: My missing corsage, my dress, the limo and hotel?
sentences.chinese: 我的胸花，礼服，轿车，还有旅馆，都是你吗？

sentences.english: The man with a flower on his chest is the leading actor in tonight's soiree.
sentences.chinese: 那个斜襟上别着胸花的是今天晚会的主角。

sentences.english: Add something special to your silk corsage with ribbons and bows.
sentences.chinese: 添加一些特别的你用丝带和蝴蝶结丝绸胸花。

sentences.english: Wrapping silk flowers makes them stay in a boutonniere.
sentences.chinese: 包装丝花使他们留在胸花。

sentences.english: Flower shape design is very consummate , the chest flower is matched for at the back having aureate silk ribbon.
sentences.chinese: 花形设计非常完美，胸花后面配有金色的丝带。

sentences.english: Hand knits corsage, cotton white liner, three layer cake type laminated.
sentences.chinese: 手工钩织的胸花，全棉白色衬里。

sentences.english: Boutonniere's pedicel may not be too long.
sentences.chinese: 胸花的花梗也不可太长。

definition: ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
